questionNl: Je wilt naar je werk. Hoe ga je het liefst: met de fiets of met de bus? Vertel ook waarom.
questionEn: You want to go to work. How do you prefer to go: by bicycle or by bus? Also explain why.
questionParts: Why do you prefer that way of travelling?

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I clearly stated which transport I prefer
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I clearly stated which transport I prefer

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I explained why I prefer it
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I explained why I prefer it

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: I spoke clearly and at a steady pace
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: I spoke clearly and at a steady pace

selfAssessmentCriteria.text: My answer was complete and made sense
selfAssessmentCriteria.textEn: My answer was complete and made sense

modelAnswer.transcript: I prefer to go by bicycle. Cycling is healthy and good for the environment. It is also free. I don't have to wait for the bus. But when it rains, I sometimes take the bus.
modelAnswer.transcriptNl: Ik ga het liefst met de fiets. Fietsen is gezond en goed voor het milieu. Het is ook gratis. Ik hoef niet op de bus te wachten. Maar als het regent, neem ik soms de bus.

tips: Make a clear choice - don't say 'I like both equally'.
Give at least two reasons for your choice.
You can mention both options to show comparison.
